cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a new algorithm for regret minimization in Stochastic Multi-Armed Bandit (MAB) instances, which is a common problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also discusses the limitations of existing algorithms and proposes a new approach that uses a constant number of words of memory. This suggests that the paper is likely to be relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), information theory (cs.IT), and systems and control (cs.SY).
